sentences.en: "Even my good reviews have tended to be backhanded compliments," he says. "They'll say I was good and almost unbearably grotesque."
sentences.cn: “即便赞扬我的评论也多似明褒实贬，”他说。“他们会说我的表演不错，荒诞得几乎让人接受不了。”

sentences.en: a grotesque distortion of the truth
A grotesque peak thrusts itself towards the sky.
By modern standards, the treatment of prisoners was grotesque.
sentences.cn: 按照现代标准来看，这样对待囚犯很荒唐。

sentences.en: Grass's novels are peopled with outlandish characters: grotesques, clowns, scarecrows, dwarfs.
sentences.cn: 格拉斯的小说充斥着稀奇古怪的人物：丑陋的怪人、小丑、邋遢的人以及侏儒。

sentences.en: Her account of the incident was a grotesque distortion of the truth.
sentences.cn: 她对这件事的陈述是荒诞地歪曲了事实.

sentences.en: His existence could only become the most grotesque of failures.
sentences.cn: 他的存在只能成为最最荒诞可笑的失败.

sentences.en: His face has a grotesque appearance.
I felt it was a grotesque intrusion into our lives.
sentences.cn: 我感觉那是对我们生活的一种干扰，让人感到荒唐可气。

sentences.en: I tossed halfsick between grotesque reality and savage, frightening dreams.
sentences.cn: 我好像生病一样在狰狞的现实与可怕的噩梦之间辗转反侧.

sentences.en: In Fernando Sorrentino's fiction there is a curious mixture of fantasy and humour that sometimes comes in a grotesque framework, and always in a verisimilar one.
sentences.cn: 费尔南多·索伦提诺的小说风格奇异，亦真亦幻，虚幻与幽默神秘地交织在一起。

sentences.en: It’s grotesque to portray peace campaigners as unpatriotic.
sentences.cn: 把和平运动的倡导者说成是不爱国，这很荒唐。

sentences.en: Its predominant vein was, in Poe's own phrase, " the grotesque and arabesque. "
sentences.cn: 它的最主要的特点, 用坡自己的话说, 就是 “ 怪诞和奇异. ”

sentences.en: She has become a grotesque parody of her former elegant self.
sentences.cn: 她成为了以前那个举止优雅的自己的怪诞模仿品.

sentences.en: The fat old man looked grotesque in his tight pants.
sentences.cn: 那胖老头穿着紧身裤显得很可笑.

sentences.en: The Spanish Steps were crowded with the sellers of grotesque caricatures.
sentences.cn: 西班牙阶梯上挤满了出售荒诞漫画的人。

sentences.en: The two stone lions, of grotesque shape, guard the entrance.
sentences.cn: 两只形态奇异的石狮子守卫着入口处.

sentences.en: They tried to avoid looking at his grotesque face and his crippled body.
sentences.cn: 他们尽量不去看他那张奇丑无比的脸和残疾的身体。

trans.tran_cn: 怪诞的，荒诞不经的，奇形怪状的
奇形怪状的东西，奇异风格
